As the guests arrived Eggman monitored them through a camera system that could pick things up throughout the park and was surprised by how many victims the rabbits brought with them and smirked at the chance of taking down heavy players like Tails, Amy, Silver and Blaze. Around the park systems played music and gave off lights that acted as subliminals that made guests unaware for when the bots could start blasting at them with the hypno rays. “Okay now let’s all try to have fun in the new park, we will split up in our groups and meet back here in two hours for lunch.” Vanilla announced to the others as they nodded in agreement. Before entering they decided to split up into groups of three to better explore the park that consisted of: Team 1- Vanilla, Cream, and Big Team 2- Silver, Blaze, and Marine Team 3- Charmy, Vector, and Espio and Team 4- Tails, Amy, and Bunnie. 14313.content:
With the island's inhabitants, Silver, Blaze, and Marine under his control Eggman began issuing his orders. He requested the construction of a base for himself and his new forces and his slaves went to work immediately. With the populace under his control there was no delay in the construction and within a matter of days his new fortress was completed.

The base looked like a military compound with walls surrounding a large tower, complete with Eggman's signature emblem emblazoned upon it, win a large empty courtyard placed in between. In the tower was Eggman's private chamber and laboratory where he could work in private away from his servants. In the lower wards, near the ground level, was a robot production facility that was already producing hundreds of robots for Eggman's theme park back home. Below the tower, hidden underground, were the arrangements for Eggman's slaves. They had their own recreation center, laboratory, and living quarters. There was also a slave processing facility. A conveyer belt took any prisoner and subjected them to hours of hypnotic therapy which gradually subjected them to Eggman's will. Eggman had plans to modify on the process in due time but for now his concerns lied elsewhere.

Eggman was considering his next move. He sat in his chamber with Blaze, Marine, and Silver standing beside him. He was speaking to the submissive feline of the group regarding the topic of locating the seven Sol Emeralds. "Now, Princess, given your connection to the Sol Emeralds and their energies I trust you should be able to find them?"

"I'm afraid it's not that easy, master." Blaze replied. A hint of regret could be heard in voice. Eggman's temper shot up as he demanded to know the issue with his orders. Blaze explained. "I can sense their energies but it will take time for me to appear. I can only sense them at random intervals. Apologies, master."

Eggman groaned in frustration. He had hoped their wouldn't be any complications for his plans and until now it seemed like a certain success for him. Taking a moment to gather his thoughts he accepted the terms Blaze had provided him and wait for the emeralds to appear. In the meantime he could work on productivity with his subjects. He pulled up designs specs of Silver for a uniform he designed and considered his next move. Either he could turn his subjects into females or dress them in uniforms based off his own. If he was going to wait he might as well do something to entertain himself.

The floor was covered in carpet and the furniture had a sense of style to them. The lighting was dim but there was enough to see the room. There was even a bar and stage on opposite ends of the room. Miley had never seen a room like it before and was amazed beyond compare before remembering the robot ordering her to clean the lounge. She started on the nearest object and started fulfilling her new duties.

"Hey there, doll face." An electronic voice called. Miley turned to see another unfamiliar robot looking at her, this time located behind the bar. She went to greet the friendly robot and started talking to him, her memory of cleaning completely gone. The two made small talk after introducing themselves. The robot, who Miley kept referring to as "Barbot", explained his job as a bartender and repeatedly made flattering remarks to the vixen's body. Miley blushed each time he did this and would do a little teasing in return. Their fun was not to last as one agitated voice called out to Barbot with a question.

Miley turned to see the owner of "her" new maid outfit was...

"Oh! Is this yours?" Miley piped up earning everyone's attention. "I found it in a closet by the lab. I was actually looking for the girl who owned it. Guess I found her."

Clove remained silent trying to process what she was looking at. Before her sat a busty fox girl, wearing HER maid outfit, who seemed to have more air in her head than a balloon. Clove didn't respond, pondering if the fox just threw a soft insult at her, but her sister Cassia answered instead. "She failed the boss and has to do maid service as punishment."

"Cassia!" Clove snapped. Despite the love she had for her sister she did not appreciate Cassia gossiping at her expense. Taking in another breath to calm her nerves she confirmed her sister's remark. "Yes, it's true. I failed Master Eggman and as punishment he makes me wear this maid outfit and clean the base. If not for the attire I could work with cleaning as a punishment."

"Yeah but you know the boss." Cassia interjected. "It's humiliation he wants to see. You dressed as a sexy maid is exactly what he would do. That or have you dressed as a Mobius Playgirl in his theme park."

"Thankfully he has some mercy towards his followers." Clove remarked before turning her attention back to Miley. "Still, thanks for finding this for me. You've saved me a lot of trouble with the boss."

"My pleasure." Miley grinned before her tone shifted from pleasant to sinister towards the green doe. "But if you ask me I think you need an attitude adjustment."

Before anyone could react Miley pulled out her ray gun and fired in Clove's direction.

Eggman could hear Blaze talking and knew he had to act fast. Pulling out the second ray gun the doctor aimed at the two girls once more and fired.
15122112122221112111.title: Eggman used the bodymorph gun

151221121222211121111.content:
As Amy and Blaze turned to see the person responsible for their forced growthspurt the hypo beam made contact with them. Their vision was engulfed ny a large spiraling image. Amy and Blaze did their best to resist falling under the spiral's effects but it was for not. Seconds after the beam made contact the two girls dropped to the floor with blank expressions on their faces. Eggman witnessed the whole ordeal and was both relieved and exstatic. He floated down to the docile duo and offered his "assistance".

"Oh dear, ladies." He said with faux sympathy. "Having a case of wardrobe and body malfunction?" Despite their incapacitated state Amy and Blaze managed a simple "yes" for a response. Eggman sneared as he continued. "Well don't worry, you two. I'll give you a new set of clothes for free in exchange for eternal loyalty and your servitude. Doesn't that sound nice?"

"Sounds nice." The hypnotized pair mumbled. Eggman continued to grin with triumph as he collected the two girls into his Egg-o-matic and fly away. He chortled with uncontrontrolled enthusiasm as he made his way back to his lair.

After a few minutes of flying across Tropical Resort Eggman returned to his hideout. As he docked his craft the doctor noticed Orbot, Cubot, and Sapphire waiting for him. The hedgehog harlet bowed as she welcomed her master. "Welcome back, master. Did you get that cute fox boy like you wanted?" Eggman coughed as he explained the situation. "Not exactly, Sapphire. It turns out we had more unexpected guests in the park and I had to take care of them." Eggman then pulled the entranced Amy and Blaze out of his machine allowing Sapphire to see. The blue hedgehog screamed with excitement before rushing over to the docile pair. She grabbed one arm from each and rushed them to them to the brainwashing machine, leaving her master and his two robots stunned.
151221121222211121111.title: The beam hits the two girls

choices: Eggman checks to make sure she knows what she's doing.
Eggman decides to just go and find Tails.
1512211212222111211112.content: Eggman stared at the busty slave, as she hurriedly prepared the devices for use.
1512211212222111211112.title: Stay with Eggman

choices: "... a slutty sex-slave for the legionnaires."
15122112122222.title: Something else...

choices: THey make it with no issues.
Tails snaps out of her brainwashing.
Sonic comes to her friend's rescue.
152.content:
Eggman looked at the security feed from his headquarters of the Incredible Interstellar Amusement Park, and smiled evilly. He had finally got his smaller mind control ray working, thanks to the Chaos Emerald he had found, and as luck would have it, Sonic and Tails (Who were both female in this reality) had just seperated, Sapphire 'Sonic' Hedgehog heading to try and liberate another planet with her powers, and Tiffany 'Tails' Prower trying to make her translation device work.

"Orbot, start playing the recordings of the announcements. Make it seem like I'm still here. I'm going to sneak up on the vixen." He ordered. The round assistant bot saluted, and Eggman stood up, and left.

Meanwhile, Tails was sitting on a bench, fiddling with her Tiffelectric handheld.

"I wish I could make this thing work properly." She said. Since Yacker was currently following Sonic, she was completely alone, and without a Wisp to test it on. "Well, I've made my alterations. I'll wait for Sonic and Yacker to return before I do anything else with it... Now, were's that cotton candy machine?"

The teenage vixen got up, and walked off, eyes closed, humming a tune, and thus did not notice the Eggomatic lowering itself down behind her, until the purple energy beam slammed into her back.

"Gotcha!" Eggman crowed. "Welcome to the Eggman Empire, Miss Prower."

"Whu-? What's happening to me... can't think... serve... Eggman..?" Tails mumbled.

"Yes, serve me, your lord and master, Doctor Ivo "Eggman" Robotnik!" He ordered.

"...O... kay..." Tails accepted.

"Now, Miss Prower. If you would kindly come with me to the headquarters? You require a makeover." Eggman coaxed.

"Whatever you say, Master." Tails droned, and began sleepwalking to the headquarters.
152.title: Female Tails

1521.content:
Soon, they arrived back at Eggman's HQ, and Eggman directed her into a large room.

"Have a seat, slave." He commanded.

"Yes Master." Tails replied, and she sat down on a chair, and a helmet locked onto her head.

"Boss? What's point of putting her in that chair?" Orbot asked.

"It's a powerful brainwasher. It will make sure she is always my servant." Eggamn replied, pulling the lever.
1521.title: THey make it with no issues.

choices: "Call your Freedom Fighter friends up her to join you,"
15211.content:
Several hours of brainwashing later, Tails stepped out of the room, now clad in a form-fitting, latex version of Eggman's outfit,

"How may I be of service, Master?" She asked. Eggman grinned, one of his most dangerous enemies was now a loyal, subserviant slave, her mind completely re-written, her sense of right and wrong flipped on its head. He then opened his mouth, and gave Tails her first order.
15211.title: Tails becomes a normal slave.

choices: The Chaos Emerald restores Tails' free will.
152111.content:
"Yes Master." Tails chimed happily, as Eggman handed her a strange gauntlet, with the Chaos Emerald embedded in the elbow end, and what looked like a scaled-down version of the mind control ray attached to her wrist.

"This is the latest version of the ray I used to recruit you." He said. He didn't care that Tails knew she was brainwashed, because the brainwashing was too strong for the simple revelation to break. Tails saluted, and walked out of the door.
152111.title: "Go and capture Sonic."

choices: Tails shows herself to Sonic first.
1521111.content: Sonic had just landed back on the Tropical Resort, as the chain connecting Planet Wisp to the park evaporated. Yakker had flown off to find some friends, as Tails approached her adoptive older sister from behind, pointing her gauntlet.
1521111.title: She finds Sonic.

choices: Sonic dodges the blast, and tries to find some kind of help.
15211112.content:
"Oh Soniiiic!" Tails said seductively. The blue fem-hog whirled around, and gasped when she saw her adoptive sister posing sexily in an Eggman Empire uniform.

"Tails? Tiff? What happened to you?" She asked, backing away.

"Master Eggman perfected his mind control ray, and I was delighted to be his test subject." Tails giggled, pointing her mind control ray at Sonic.
15211112.title: Tails shows herself to Sonic first.

152111121.content:
"Tails you have to snapp out of it!", says Sonic.
"Sorry I don`t want to!", says Tails und shoot at her Sister.
"No what have you... I must obey...", says Sonic after she was hit.
"Follow me Sis.", Tails orders.
152111121.title: Sonic is hit.

1521111211.content:
Tails returned to her master with her sister Sonic cuffed and still entranced. The sight brought Eggman bursting into fits of joyful laughter to see his nemesis, albeit somewhat unaware of the events taking place, at his mercy. He congratulated Tails on her success which she accepted with humble pride. Eggman then ordered Sonic into the chair that transformed Tails and the hedgehog obeyed his command.

The topic between them shifted to Sonic and what to do with her. Eggman had the obvious suggestion to turn the hedgehog into a loyal minion like Tails while his fox servant had a much different idea of what to do with her sister, namely turn her into her personal slave. Eggman was surprised to see such an aggressive attitude towards coming from Tails but didn't like the idea any less as he wasn't going to deny the chance to see his sworn enemy humiliated and not fight back. The doctor proceeded to activate the machine and both witnessed as Sonic's transformation had started,
1521111211.title: Tails brings Sonic to Eggman

choices: Fiona Fox (Who is still with the FF in this dimension.)

"Which one master?"asked Tails."I have a few."

Eggman stopped to think for a second and said "____"

1521122.content:
"Why not bring up your little girlfriend, Fiona Fox?" Eggman asked. "After all, I'd hate to split up your little relationship."

"Of course, Master." Tails replied, picking up her communicator. She dialed Fiona;s number, and waited.

"Hello? Tiff? What's up?" Fiona asked.

"Hi, yeah, we've run into a spot of trouble up here, and we need you to come help. Can you make it?" Tails lied.

"Sure, be right there." FIona replied.
1521122.title: Fiona Fox (Who is still with the FF in this dim...

15211222.content:
Fiona decided it was best to come alone to the park.The reason the Fiona did not betray the Freedon fighters is because both Tiffany and Fiona are in madly in love with each other.Sonic however does not know this.

Fiona began searching around for Tiffany...

choices: Sonic arrives to save her friends.
152112222.content:
Fiona was making her way through the park, looking for her friends, not knowing that she was being followed by Tails. The golden fox shadowed her, before jumping down and clamping her hand over her mouth.

"Hi, honey." She whispered.
152112222.title: Fiona runs into Tiffany

1521122221.content:
Tails dragged the struggling vixen to Eggman, and sat her down in the same chair that she had been seated in when she arrived.

"Tiff? What are you doing? Why are you dressed like Eggman?" Fiona gasped, as Tails smiled at her, and Eggman entered the room.

"Because, my dear girl, she has decided to join me, as my obedient slave!" He replied.

"You brainwahsed her!" FIona yelled, angry tears running down her face.

"Indeed I did. And now, I'm going to brainwash you." Eggman grinned. "Or rather, your little girlfriend is. Miss Prower, fire up the ray, and make Miss Fox a mindless slave, loyal to..."
1521122221.title: Tails takes Fiona to Eggman.

choices: Eggman sends them out to capture Sonic.
15211222212.content:
"Really, Master?" Tails asked.

"Of course. You are the grandmaster, or grandmistress, rather, of this new Dark Egg Legion Chapter. Of course, Miss Hedgehog, Miss Lynx, and the Princess will be your top agents, but you are free to have the odd... personal follower among them." Eggman replied.

"Oh, thank you Master." Tails giggled, pulling the lever. THe mind control beam fired, and struck Fiona right between the eyes. Instantly, spirals filled them, and her eyelids drooped.

"Wha-?" She moaned.

"Yes, Fiona. Listen to my voice. It may be a little hard to think, but you don't need to think. You need to obey. Forget your past. You need it no longer. All you need is your loyalty to the Eggman Empire. Your loyalty to me, your Mistress, and your lover. Obey me. Worship me. Love me." Tails crooned, leaning forward as she did so.

"... Obey... Worship... Love... Mistress." Fiona droned. The spirals in her eyes faded, and the beam stopped, leaving her entranced on the seat. It lowered a helm onto her head, and locked intp place, as Eggman and Tails left the room.

Several hours of brainwashing later, Tails was seated at a workbench, making modifications to the mind control device as Eggman stood next to her, when Fiona walked in. She was now wearing an Eggman uniform, with a twist. Her midriff was exposed, her upper body was clad in a tube top, her arms hidden by long gloves, and the requisite black latex pants on her legs, topped off with matching boots. She still had her bow in her hair, of course, and it seemed that she wasn't wearing any form of underwear.

"Miss Prower, why does Fiona look like... that?" Eggman asked. Despite the tight fitting uniforms he had come up with for his slaves, they were designed to conceal their bodies, since, as a human, he was naturally uncomfortable with viewing the naked Mobian form.

"Personal preference for my personal slave, Master." Tails replied, winking at Fiona. The older vixen blushed and smiled.

"Fiona Fox ready and willing to serve the Eggman Empire in any way possible. Especially if it makes my Mistress happy." She giggled.
15211222212.title: Tiffany's Legion Chapter.

1522.content:
As she walked, Tails eyes demisted, and she began to rub her head.

"Ugh, what hit me..." She groaned. Eggman scowled, but managed to keep quiet. Shouting would alert her to what was going on All he ahd to do was give her another zap and send her into blissful obedience again, so they could return to the base on the double. Watching her march robotically ahead of him was amusing, but not particularly punctual. He'd just have to pick her up and rush her back.
1522.title: Tails snaps out of her brainwashing.

15221.content: Tails had a moment of comprehension of where she was and what was happening to her, before another blast of the hypno-beam buried her mind under a layer of cotton wool. After running through a brief induction again, Eggman scooped her up with the Eggmobile's arm and rushed toward his base.
15221.title: Eggman gives Tails another zap before she can r...

15223.content: Tails looked up in fear at Eggman before realizing what happened- She was willingly walking with a man that she utterly despised. Almost immediately, she attempted to run. Unfortunately, Eggman was staring at his mind control ray and slamming at the controls as he sent Egg-Pawns towards the wayward vixen- Clearly the old man was intent on ensuring that the vixen wouldn't be able to reach that ever so irritating hedgehog. Yet Tails was paying attention to other things- Cameras. After all, she was in Eggman's Interstellar Amusement Park. He had cameras everywhere, so she was looking for anywhere that didn't have a camera in sight- That would be her safe haven. Sure, she was fast with her tails, but as of late, she'd been out of practice. As such, she needed to do her best impression of a certain government spy and a certain ninja- She needed to stay out of sight. After this, she would be glad to take the elevator back down to Earth- She could use a space ship to infiltrate the amusement park another time...

info.brief_description: What would have happened if Eggman used mind control beam on a sonic girl during "Colors".
info.description: In this story, eggman had worked out the kinks in his smaller mind control ray during colors (the big one still blows up). Now, he is off to recruit sonic female charaters into the eggman empire. Yes, this is another "hypnotize characters and dress them as another" story. Eggman empire uniforms are all based on Eggie's main uniform, but some variation across clothes is nice (such as having Rouge keep heart motifs). If a pic can be supplied it would be appreciated. The only restrictions are no ocs or vore. This is a hypno story. If you like this, try my other story.
